\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 73398}

\subsection*{DXM and 'The Test'}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{8764}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated &  & DXM & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 0.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I just wanted to say that I have taken many drug tests in the past while on DXM without a hitch.  When I say `on DXM', I mean that I had dosed about an hour and a half to two hours before the test.



I have one of the tests and it said that the following were tested for:

Cocaine

Marijuana

Opiates/Morphine

Amphetamines

Methamphetamine

Phencyclidine

Benzodiazepine

Barbituate

Oxycodone

Methylenedioxymethamphetamine



It was a urine test done in a lab.



Tolerance MAY be an issue.  I had been taking DXM fairly regularly for approximately four years.  DXM is great.  It drains my soul, but it's fun at the time!

\end{document}
